text: Your laugh is my favorite sound in the world. It lights up every room and makes my heart skip a beat.
The way you make pancakes on Sunday mornings, dancing around the kitchen like nobody's watching.
Your kindness to strangers shows me what a beautiful soul you have. You make the world brighter.
How you scrunch your nose when you're concentrating. It's the cutest thing I've ever seen.
Your strength during tough times inspires me every day. You're my hero in so many ways.
The way you remember little details about everyone you meet. Your caring heart amazes me.
How you steal my hoodies and somehow make them look better on you than they ever did on me.
Your dreams and ambitions. Watching you chase your goals makes me fall in love with you more each day.
